paragraphs: Monster Sanctuary is out today on PlayStation, Xbox (and Game Pass!), Switch, and PC. What is it? Well, it's a cozy little creature collector where you assemble a team of monsters, battle them, collect gear, and learn new skills! The world is full of different interactions that you can unlock with creature abilities, and you can level up and grind your team to new heights to your heart's content.

Oh, there's PVP too or something in case you feel like showing off your mad skills. So what are we going to do? We're going to play it, of course! On another exciting episode of New Gameplay Today Live, join Dan Tack on his first experience with the game. Let's learn together as we explore this magical world full of fun critters and dangerous enemies!
Ready to join in the fun? We're going live at 2 PM CT, so come on by and enjoy the show!
